name: Amiya Ranjan Panda
content: Amiya Ranjan Panda - KIIT School of Computer Engineering Skip to content Go to KIIT Home pageKIIT HomeProf. Achyuta Samanta Founder – KIIT & KISS achyutasamanta.com Amiya Ranjan Panda Amiya Ranjan Panda Amiya Ranjan Panda Assistant ProfessorDr. Amiya Ranjan Panda has seven years of research experience in DRDO and one year of teaching experience. He received the B.Tech. degree in information technology from Biju Patnaik University of Technology, Rourkela, India, in 2009, and the M.Tech. degree in computer science and engineering from the Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (KIIT), Bhubaneshwar, India, in 2012. He received Ph.D. degree from Siksha “O” Anusandhan University, Bhubaneshwar in the year 2017 working in a real-time project “Design, development and implementation of Software Defined Radio based Flight Termination System” of DRDO, ITR, chandipur. He has worked as JRF, SRF and RA in DRDO, ITR, Chandipur for more than 7 years. Then he has worked as Assistant Professor in Siksha ‘O’ Anusandhan University for 4 months and currently he is working as Assistant Professor in KIIT Deemed to be University, Bhubaneswar. His research interest is Machine learning, IOT, data acquisition system and Software Defined Radio. He has published 15 international journals. Two of the journals are published in IEEE Transaction of Industrial Informatics. One edited book has been accepted for publication in 2019. He is expert in teaching Data Structure and algorithm, Database Management System (DBMS), Artificial Intelligence, Operating System, Compiler Design, Computer Network, Machine Learning etc. Profile LinksEmail :[email protected]Website :sites.google.com Social LinksProfileRecent PublicationsProfileEducational QualificationPh.D. in Computer Science and EngineeringResearch Interests Machine Learning Data mining IOT Software Defined Radio Administrative ResponsibilityFaculty In-change UG SeminarAwards & Honours 1.
